WITHDRAWALDESCRIPTION: No longer provides any transfer agency services.  All service functions transferred to third-party service provider.

ENTITYNAME: Pioneer Investment Management Shareholder Services Inc
WITHDRAWALDESCRIPTION: functions have been outsourced to a 3rd party transfer agent

The transfer agent business of Valiant Trust Company was purchased by Computershare Canada in May of 2015. Between May 1, 2015 and October 27, 2015, all of the former Valiant Trust Company transfer agent clients were migrated to Computershare's systems.
Registrant never acted, or intends to act in the future, in the capacity of a registered transfer agent
